conflicts_resolved.resolution: Verified via npm audit: 0 production, 7 development vulnerabilities
Coverage command misconfigured, exact percentage unverifiable
Build completes but exact sizes need webpack-bundle-analyzer

consensus_items: Test infrastructure exists but needs improvement

immediate_actions: Fix Jest configuration conflict for coverage reporting
Run webpack-bundle-analyzer to verify bundle sizes
Execute full test suite to identify flaky tests
Update npm dependencies to resolve dev vulnerabilities
validation_gaps: Performance metrics need actual load testing
User experience scores need user data
Test coverage percentage needs proper configuration

final_assessment.notes: Most agent findings are accurate. Security vulnerabilities were overstated. The codebase is more production-ready than initially assessed. Main issues are in development dependencies and test configuration, not critical production code.
